eu.monnetproject.translation

Interface Decoder


  • public interface Decoder
    A decoder, which composes a set of candidate phrase translations to a translation
    Author:
    John McCrae

      • decode

        List<Translation> decode(List<String> phrase,
                       PhraseTable phraseTable,
                       int nBest)
        Decode a phrase
        Parameters:
        phrase - The source phrase
        phraseTable - The phrase table containing all candidates
        nBest - The maximum number of translations to return
        Returns:
        The translations ranked by score
